item.title: Who is using Go in enterprise?
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Who is using Go in enterprise? Technology Giants Google Created Go in 2007 Uses Go for many internal tools and services Examples: Kubernetes, Docker (partially) Reference: Go at Google: Language Design in the Service of Software Engineering

item.title: Why Enterprise Chose Java

item.title: Why Go?
